about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a frontend developer passionate about building responsive, user-friendly websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. I enjoy turning ideas into interactive digital experiences. I'm currently expanding my skills into backend development to become a full-stack developer. I'm always open to new projects, learning opportunities, and collaborations that help me grow and create impactful work.
